backendUrl.title: check-if-email-exists backend URL
backendUrl.description: Base URL of your check-if-email-exists HTTP backend (for example, https://your-backend.example.com or http://localhost:8080).

emails.title: Emails to verify
emails.description: List of email addresses to verify. Each address will be sent to the backend at POST {backendUrl}/v0/check_email.

proxy.title: Optional SOCKS5 proxy configuration
proxy.description: Proxy configuration passed through to the check-if-email-exists backend as the `proxy` field.
